DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Time to wake up, [main]!

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Why does waking up exist? Normally, I hate it, but knowing what I have to do today makes it even worse.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Coming!

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Mom looks like she didn't sleep at all last night. I hope she's okay.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Here's lunch. Breakfast is on the stove.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I quickly eat my breakfast and get in the car.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: This afternoon, right?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Yeah. The principal's office is to the right of the main entrance. I'll be waiting around there.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: We arrive at school.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Bye Mom. Thanks so much.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: I'll see you later today, kiddo.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: With a weak smile, she drives away.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: From around the corner, Lyanna walks up to greet me.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Sawyer messaged me about what happened yesterday. Are you alright?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I guess...

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Let me buy you a cookie. It's the least I can do.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Let me buy you a cookie. It's the least I can do.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Thanks.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: We head towards the cafeteria. I look around for Kris, but don’t catch a glimpse of her.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: I’ll try my best to stick with you today. Kris can’t attack you if we’re together.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Lyanna, why do you believe me?

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Why would I not? It’s not like Kris is some sort of goddess or something.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I smile. What did I do to deserve a friend like this?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Hold on, my paraself is messaging me.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Oh, are you getting along with them?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I, uhh, yeah, you could say that.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I’d rather not admit to Lyanna that I’m manipulating my paraself.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: That’s great, [main]! It took me a while to accept some parts of myself.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I look at the message, hiding my shame.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: Have you started your conversation?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Not yet.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: If you don’t mind me asking, could you leave the prism on so I can hear the conversation?

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: This wasn’t supposed to happen.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: I respect the hustle, but it was a stretch to think that you could trick yourself.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: Don't lie to me.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: I would be mad at you, but I would have done the same thing. How about we both go at the same time? I’m not going to help you with anything though.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Fair is fair.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: And thus, my plan to trick myself was ruined.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: School is a blur. I guess I shouldn’t have expected to be able to focus today.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I get a text from my mom.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: I’m just leaving the house. I’ll be there soon.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: I’m just leaving the house. I’ll be there soon.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: I’m just leaving the house. I’ll be there soon.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I message my paraself that I’m almost ready to start my conversation with the principal.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: Do you mind turning the prism on during the conversation so I can hear everything that happens?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I don't mind.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: Thanks.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Why couldn’t the school just have believed me the first time? While I wait for my mom, I keep my prism on and chat with my paraself. She arrives, and I keep it on per my paraself’s request.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I message my paraself.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: It’s almost time for me to go. What happened on your end?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: It went exactly as I wanted it to. We managed to bring Kris into the office and got her to confess.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Should I do the same thing?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: If it worked for me, I don't see why not.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: My plan in mind, I wait for my mom to arrive.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I blew my opportunity to get some help from my paraself. I suppose that’s my fault.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: With nothing to do, I wait around anxiously until my mom arrives.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: I called ahead so they know I’ll be here. Are you ready?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Yeah, let's get this over with.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: We make our way to the principal’s office. My shoes feel like they're made of lead.

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: Good afternoon, ma’am. You’re [main]’s mother, I presume?

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: That's right.

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: What would you like to discuss?

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: How could you let my child get attacked in the locker room and do nothing about it?

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: We have no idea what happened in the locker room yesterday. While we have heard your complaints, we have no reason to believe that Kris has done anything wrong.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Are you calling my child a liar?

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: We aren’t calling anybody anything.

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: Yesterday, we had a chat with the student in question, Kris, who both claimed that she didn’t attack your child and that she and your child had a previously good relationship.

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: She also said that she helped your child with their homework, and that she lent your child her homework to check answers when [main] tried to pass off Kris’s homework as their own.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: And you believe Kris’s story?

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: Ma’am, I understand your frustration, but there wasn’t anyone else in the locker room at the time. There’s nothing we can do about it anymore.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Have you checked the homework she turned in?

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: Yes, we have. It has her name on it, and everything is in her handwriting.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: My mom takes a moment to think.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: My child gets mugged and there's nothing you can do about it? Some school.

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: Ma’am, what would you like us to do?

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Believe my child and punish the assailant.

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: I’m afraid we can’t do that ma’am.

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: I’m afraid we can’t do that ma’am.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Can we bring in Kris?

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: Kris is a busy girl. She’s in soccer practice right now, I believe.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Are you telling me that you can’t bring in a thief because of soccer practice?

DialogueNode.Name: Principal
DialogueNode.Text: Out of respect for her time, we cannot.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: In all of my 16 years, I’ve never seen my mom this mad.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Well, thank you for your “help” today.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: My mom storms out of the office and I follow her.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: My mom storms out of the office and I follow her.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: My mom storms out of the office and I follow her.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I avoid my mom’s gaze as we walk towards the car.
